item.description:
This is a fundraising event for which all proceeds go to Living Waters Center of Hope and Merrimack Valley Food Bank. This event is also being posted on our other sites "Our Circle of Friends" and also "Improving Our Communities Together".

Entrance to this event costs a small donation plus a non-perishable food item. The write up by Living waters is as follows:

Join us to HELP FIGHT HUNGER! For a small donation you will pick out a unique bowl that has been made/bought/recycled and keep that bowl as a reminder of all the empty bowls in this world. You will enjoy some homemade soups – made/donated and served by the Culinary St…udents of Greater Lowell Tech, Lowell HS’s Hospitality Academy, Nashoba Valley Tech., Nashua Tech Center, Chowder Factory and more…….

We will also have a presentation, music and a raffle that includes local artist’s pieces, local business gift certificates, etc. This continues to grow.

ALL PROCEEDS FROM THIS EVENT TO BENEFIT “LIVING WATERS CENTER OF HOPE” and they in turn will be sharing a portion of the proceeds with the Merrimack Valley Food Bank!!

This year, as well as a tax-deductible donation, you will be asked to bring a non-perishable food item for Merrimack Valley Food Bank.

So come on out and meetup with us for a great cause.

If you would also like to make a bowl to donate, the following stores are participating, just mention the Empty Bowls for a special price:

  • Magic Brush Pottery of Tewksbury
  • Time to Clay of Nashua
  • Fire Your Desire of Acton
  • Ancient Echos of Art of Chelmsford
  • Artwood Studios of Dracut.

Hope to see you all at this event. Remember to bring the Meetup cell phone number in case you get lost or can't find us (978-304-2811).

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Near the Entrance to the event
item.name: Greater Lowell Empty Bowls
